trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to check out a file that is checked into a source code management program is canceled or fails.
trans-unit.target: 当签出被签入源代码管理程序的文件的尝试被取消或失败时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref> class with no associated message or error code.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref>与任何关联的消息或错误代码的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref>使用指定的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref> class using the specified serialization data and context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref>类使用指定的序列化数据和上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used for deserialization.
The destination to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 要用于反序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref> class with the specified detailed description and the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref>使用指定的详细的说明和指定的异常类。

trans-unit.source: A detailed description of the error.
A reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 对此异常原因的内部异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref> class with the specified message and error code.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref>类替换为指定的消息和错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref> class that specifies that the check out was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CheckoutException"></xref>类，该类指定已取消该签出。

trans-unit.source: This exception occurs if the user selects `Cancel` on the checkout dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户选择，则会发生此异常`Cancel`在签出对话框中。
